entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 7.
